scripts.build:prod: lerna run build --scope app --scope homepage --parallel && gulp
scripts.build:dependents: lerna run build --scope codesandbox-api --scope common --scope codesandbox-browserfs --stream && lerna run build --scope smooshpack --stream && lerna run build --scope react-smooshpack --stream
scripts.start: lerna run build --scope codesandbox-browserfs --stream && lerna run start --parallel
scripts.start:dev_api: lerna run start --parallel --ignore app & lerna run start:dev_api --scope app --stream
scripts.test:jest-lite: lerna exec --scope app --stream -- yarn run test jest-lite --watch --coverage
